name: Kingdom Knight The first act: King captured.
name_original: Kingdom Knight The first act: King captured.
description:
KINGDOM KNIGHT

The first act : King captured.

Kingdom knight is a game that tells about a knight living in a faraway land who kneeled to a "just" king, but now, the kingdom was destroyed by a neighboring kingdom and now the king has been captured, you as a knight are required to save the king by defeating the guards who block your way.

This game is the result of learning during my lectures, therefore I hope for criticism and suggestions for this game, besides that this game also  supports Windows 64 bit  or higher.

Notes : 

  • This version is still a prototype, but in the future we will make improvements
  • If you want to exit the game, you can press the windows button on your keyboard and exit the software

Game Controls : 

  • A = Back
  • D = Forward
  • SPACE = Jump
